'''Kabayama''' is a temporary NPC in [[Enkanomiya]] that appears during the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Reading Kabayama's Lanterns]].''

==Location==
During [[Evernight]], sit down on the rock in the hidden room for Kabayama to appear.
